title: The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993) 720p - 5.1 AC3 Audio [AoA]
description:
Hey all...

I primarily upload to a fairly popular video sharing site (which I won\\\'t name... don\\\'t wanna \\\"spam\\\" LOL) and I have been for a couple of years now. I am \\\"Googleable\\\" (just Google \\\"AC3 Audio\\\" + AnOkAlias). All of the files that I share are personal rips from my collection and have a minimum of \\\"720x...\\\" resolution with AC3 audio (5.1 or higher if available) and (as of early October 2011) soft-coded English subs (for either non-English (parts of) movies or SDH and are available for streaming or downloading from the aforementioned video site if you prefer either of those. I will always have more titles there... these are mainly the titles that are more of a \\\"p.i.t.a.\\\" to have to ReRip... and the most recent 3 will be seeded as often as I\\\'m actively online, for a minimum of 2-3 weeks. After that... it\\\'s up to you... though I may occasionally ReSeed a title or 2 as needed.

I really enjoy sharing... and welcome feedback... so lemme know what you think of the quality... and please... help keep \\\'em going... seed to at least a 1.5-2:1 ratio.

Enjoy!
